item.mainDescription: Are you sure you want to end the flight?
There are 2 types of effects — negative and positive. Negative effects are imposed on the hero by various creatures and hinder his flight. Positive effects help the hero in flight.
The positive effect 'Jetpack' gives the hero maneuverability and speed boost.
The positive effect 'Magnet' attracts all positive effects and coins to the hero.
The positive effect 'Shield' provides the hero with protection from negative effects.
The positive effect 'Booster' gives the hero a speed boost.
The negative effect 'Snail' reduces the hero's speed.
The negative effect 'Dizziness' reduces the hero's maneuverability.
All data will be reset, records on the leaderboard will be recorded from the beginning, a new game will start. Do you want to continue anyway?
In the next flight, try to soar high up; a new level awaits you there!
Hello there! Welcome to the Tutorial! Look who we've got here — it's your hero, ready to fly around the entire planet!
See that square over there? It shows your hero's level! Next to it, you can see the accumulated experience and how much you need to reach the next level and become even better!
Check out these gold coins — they are the main currency in the game! You can use them to buy upgrades for your hero, making the journey around the planet easier.
Wow! Do you see these crystals? They're real treasures, so rare that they unlock the coolest upgrades!
Here's the settings button! Click it to open the menu where you can customize the game to your liking: adjust sound, select a language, and more.
In front of you is the upgrade shop button! Clicking it opens a portal to a world of incredible upgrades.
This button leads to the core of your hero's power! Here you can enhance his basic attributes, like maneuverability. Level them up to prepare your hero for any challenges ahead!
The achievements button opens the doors to your hero's hall of fame! Here you can see all his accomplishments: from impressive leaderboard records to personal achievements earned during adventures.
Get ready to change your style! Here you will find an amazing collection of costumes for your hero. Choose one that highlights his uniqueness and adds flair to his adventures!
It's time to embark on an exciting journey! Press 'Play' to start the game.
You're in flight! Tap the left side of the screen (or press W) to fly up, and the right side (or press S) to fly down.
This gear icon in the upper left corner of the screen will take you to the world of settings.
See the level your hero is flying at now! Each level offers new challenges and discoveries.
Here you'll see the distance your hero has already covered and find out the total distance you need to overcome.
This is the money panel, displaying the amount your hero has collected during the flight. Coins can be spent on upgrading the hero and buying additional boosts.
Look at the speedometer — it has minimum and maximum marks to help maintain the necessary pace. If the speed drops too low, your hero will start to fall, try to avoid this!
This is the effects panel — here are all the bonuses your hero found during the flight! These effects can be positive or negative.
Watch out! A flock of birds is rushing straight at you. Your task is to dodge them. But if you manage to fly between two birds, you'll get a valuable bonus.
Oh no, your speed is dropping! A big booster has appeared on your path, which can be unlocked in the upgrade shop, collect it to get an additional boost.
Hooray! Your collection of effects now includes acceleration — it provides a temporary speed increase. Your hero can get all such boosters in the upgrade shop.
At different altitudes, enemies await your hero, and one is already heading towards you! Try to dodge it to avoid negative effects!
At the initial level, your hero quickly loses speed and can't fly fast or dodge well. To fix this, upgrade his basic attributes after the flight.
Developing your character requires coins, lots of coins! Collect coins on your path, they are right in front of you.
Congratulations, you have completed the basic hero course. All this knowledge will help you fly around the planet. Now you can embark on a free flight!

item.secondaryDescription: The most standard inhabitant and conqueror of Earth.
Never before has a UFO been so charged with motivation to conquer a new planet as it is now!
Long ago, in a galaxy far, far away, the first Kartopych from the Kartopych civilization was launched into space. Since then, it has been exploring infinity!
Allows you to find a shield in flight. +effect 'shield'
Long-lasting protection that withstands serious attacks
Allows you to find a jetpack in flight. +effect 'jetpack'
Maintains higher speed and maneuverability longer
Keeps the jetpack for even longer
Increased flight range with the jetpack
Provides maximum flight range with the jetpack
Allows you to find the acceleration effect in flight. +effect 'boost'
Increases speed for a few more seconds
Extends speed for a couple more seconds
Allows you to find the magnet effect in flight. +effect 'magnet'
The hero flies even longer with the magnet
